text:
I'm back!
Did everything go okay?

Yeah, it went perfectly. I took shots that capture
the entire body, so we can review them later.

Putting on the costume really changes
the feel from rehearsal, doesn't it?

Yeah, this costume has a skirt that flutters,
so it spreads differently depending on the movement.

Meguru, I'm glad you're making proactive
suggestions like this.

Hehe,
I want you to see the costumes properly too!

I'm wondering how to dance to show the most beautiful
form, but I won't know until I actually see it!
I hope we can grasp something useful...!
